availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Bibb (Green County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Monroe County, Kentucky, native. Married to Nancy Ann Smith Bibb in Green County, Kentucky, on July 1, 1849. Father of Alice H. Bibb, William Bibb, James Bibb, John Bibb, Thomas Bibb, Mary M. Bibb, and Richard Bibb. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860. Farmer in Green County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 115A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 660.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Greensburg Precinct, p. 410A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Green County, KY, September 1863, p. 11.
Kentucky, County Marriages, 1797-1954, Genealogical Society of Salt Lake City, Salt Lake City, UT, Green County Marriages, Film 007721466.
